staff.name: Bri Johnson - CEO
staff.description: Meet our CEO! Bri Johnson is a Freshman at Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University in Florida. She is currently majoring in Astrophysics and Global Conflict.

staff.name: Aayan Rahat - COO
staff.description: Meet our COO! Aayan Rahat is a junior at Centennial High School in Texas. He plans to study computer science.

staff.name: Jay Wankhede - CTO
staff.description: Meet our CTO! Jay Wankhede is a senior at Poolesville Highschool. He plans to pursue  computer science with a focus on machine learning.
